title: Start Again: A Second Chance Standalone Romance (Start Again Series Book 1)
features: One night. One accident. And her life was forever changed.

Kate Taylor is searching for a way out. A fresh start to finally put her haunting past to rest. Out of options and willing to try just about anything, she sets off on a road trip across the country. Her destination? Unknown. That is until she encounters Ryan Grant, the irresistibly sexy and mysterious stranger with a past of his own. One kiss, one touch, and she’s giving into everything she swore she wouldn’t. Rules are broken. Attraction is turning to love. And Kate’s heart is once again on the line. But when what she’s been running from catches up with her, will Ryan be able to forgive her for the choices she makes?

Fans of second chance, friends-to-lovers, and billionaires will fall in love with this steamy and emotional series. Scroll up and one click to start reading this unforgettable STANDALONE new adult contemporary romance today!
